ability.ability_dark_passage.name: Dark Passage
ability.ability_dark_passage.desc: Allows you to use Organization Portals without being apart of the Organization.
ability.ability_rage_awakened.name: Rage Awakened
ability.ability_rage_awakened.desc: Allows you to give into your rage and let your heart blacken with anger -- let it empower you!
ability.ability_darkness_boost.name: Darkness Boost
ability.ability_darkness_boost.desc: Increases damage done with dark-based attacks.
ability.ability_dark_power.name: Dark Power
ability.ability_dark_power.desc: Allows you to embrace the power of Darkness and access Dark Mode.
ability.ability_way_to_light.name: Way to Light
ability.ability_way_to_light.desc: Allows you to embrace the power of Light and access Light Form.
ability.ability_light_boost.name: Light Boost
ability.ability_light_boost.desc: Increases damage done with light-based attacks.
ability.ability_adrenaline.name: Adrenaline
ability.ability_adrenaline.desc: Increases your strength stat when you're low on HP.
ability.ability_critical_surge.name: Critical Surge
ability.ability_critical_surge.desc: Increases your magic stat when you're low on HP.
ability.ability_light_step_0.name: Light Step I
ability.ability_light_step_1.name: Light Step II
ability.ability_light_step_2.name: Light Step III
ability.ability_light_step.desc: Engulf yourself in Light and dash with the Action Button while sprinting!
ability.ability_dark_step_0.name: Dark Step I
ability.ability_dark_step_1.name: Dark Step II
ability.ability_dark_step_2.name: Dark Step III
ability.ability_dark_step.desc: Engulf yourself in Darkness and dash with the Action Button while sprinting!
ability.ability_light_within.name: Light Within
ability.ability_light_within.desc: Empowers you with the power of Light! Equip Light Boost to increase the effect.
ability.ability_darkness_within.name: Darkness Within
ability.ability_darkness_within.desc: Empowers you with the power of Darkness! Equip Darkness Boost to increase the effect.
ability.ability_hp_walker.name: HP Walker
ability.ability_mp_walker.name: MP Walker
ability.ability_exp_walker.name: EXP Walker
ability.ability_hp_walker.desc: Recover HP as you walk or run. Stack the ability to increase the effect.
ability.ability_mp_walker.desc: Recover MP as you walk or run. MP recharging speed remains unchanged. Stack the ability to increase the effect.
ability.ability_exp_walker.desc: Gain EXP as you walk or run.
shotlock.flame_salvo.name: Flame Salvo
shotlock.bubble_blaster.name: Bubble Blaster
shotlock.thunderstorm.name: Thunderstorm
shotlock.bio_barrage.name: Bio Barrage
shotlock.meteor_shower.name: Meteor Shower
form.form_rage.name: Rage Form
form.form_dark.name: Dark Mode
form.form_light.name: Light Form
menu_button.prestigeConfirm.desc: Resets your level and choice. WARNING!!! You cannot undo this!!!
menu_button.prestige.desc: Allows you to reset your level if you meet the requirements.
